newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka rupee closes flat on high dlr liquidity.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka rupee closes flat on high dlr liquidity.

text.p: The Sri Lankan rupee closed unmoved against the dollar on Thursday, due to the markt being well supplied with the greenback, dealers said.
The rupee closed at its opening level of 58.48 to the dollar, after moving in a thin range, they said.
"There was a little demand for dollars, but the market has more than enough to supply double what was needed," said a foreign bank dealer.
Overnight call money closed at 9.5 percent after moving in a right range, as the market was well offered, dealers said.
The Central Bank overnight repo rate remained at 8.75 percent.
